To draw meaningful conclusions from data, you must visualize it.  
Raincloud plots are incredibly useful for this.  
  
And the best thing is: You can [make your own in a few clicks](https://jasp-stats.org/2024/07/26/raincloud-plots-in-jasp-incredibly-useful-surprisingly-easy/){target="_blank"}.
